This is the middle column for the page's main text. The formatting of the text and positioning of the columns are all controlled by the CSS file. Do not mess with any of that stuff.

Using a text editor or text view of an HTML editor please read the instructions contained in the comments in the HEAD of this page.

DO NOT USE NETSCAPE COMPOSER.

DO NOT USE ANY MICROSOFT PRODUCT BUT NOTEPAD TO EDIT THIS PAGE.

The page layout is controlled by the style sheet referenced in the head. DO NOT edit the style sheet. DO NOT edit the page to format the style of the words or paragraphs, the style sheet on the site will do all of that automatically.

DO make sure the stylesheet is at the same directory level as the page you create.

Unless you also download the style sheet and also have a good HTML editor, the page will not appear on your hard drive in the same way as it will on the website. Do not trust your WYSIWYG editors to render the page properly -- they are generally incapable of doing so.
